PolicyGroup.PublicAccess.Description.other: Accesso pubblico agli endpoint di scoperta

PolicyGroup.PublicAccess.Rule2.other: Accesso anonimo agli endpoint di reimpostazione della password (PUT, POST)

PolicyGroup.PublicAccess.Rule3.other: Accesso anonimo per caricare lo stato del frontend (GET)

PolicyGroup.PublicAccess.Rule4.other: Accesso anonimo alla sessione di inizializzazione del frontend (POST)

PolicyGroup.PublicInstall.Description.other: Gli endpoint di installazione richiedono un accesso pubblico per la prima esecuzione

PolicyGroup.PublicInstall.Rule1.other: Accesso anonimo per l'installazione degli endpoint (GET, POST)

PolicyGroup.LoggedUsers.Description.other: Decidere come gli utenti standard/condivisi e gli amministratori possono accedere le API rest

PolicyGroup.LoggedUsers.Rule1.other: Accesso REST completo al profilo dell'Amministratore

PolicyGroup.LoggedUsers.Rule2.other: Accesso REST predefinito per l'utente registrato

PolicyGroup.OIDC.Description.other: Enable/Disable authentications in OpenID Connect Server

PolicyGroup.OIDC.Rule1.other: Default accesses to login action for all users

PolicyGroup.ACLSample1.Description.other: Sample Complex Policy for managing ACLs dynamically

PolicyGroup.ACLSample1.Rule2.other: Preventing modification based on IP and file metadata conditions

PolicyGroup.ACLSample1.Rule3.other: Filter out display of a any file with a PNG extension

PolicyGroup.ACLSamplePeriod.Description.other: Enables access to a workspace only for a given period

PolicyGroup.ACLSamplePeriod.Rule1.other: ACL Rule example, allowing access only in Feb. and March 2018

PolicyGroup.ACLSampleDateDisable.Title.other: [Example] No access after a given date

PolicyGroup.ACLSampleDateDisable.Descrip.other: Disable access to a workspace after a given date

PolicyGroup.ACLSampleDateDisable.Rule2.other: Deny read/write if date is after 2018-02-28

PolicyGroup.ACLSampleBusinessHours.Title.other: [Example] Access allowed only during business hours

PolicyGroup.ACLSampleBusinessHours.Descr.other: Enable access to a workspace only certain days within pre-defined hours

PolicyGroup.ACLSampleBusinessHours.Rule1.other: Office hours rule example, allowing read/write

PolicyGroup.ACLSampleExternalIP.Descript.other: Disable access to IPs outside of LAN

PolicyGroup.ACLSampleExternalIP.Rule2.other: Denying IP if it's not localhost, 127.0.0.1 or ::1
